meanings.definition: To lower in dignity or honor.
meanings.sent1: Being rude to others bemeans their feelings.
meanings.sent2: His careless behavior bemeans the reputation of the company.
meanings.sent3: Laughing at someone's mistakes bemeans their efforts.
meanings.sent4: Ignoring hard work bemeans the value of dedication.
meanings.sent5: A true leader never bemeans the efforts of their team.

meanings.definition: To cause to seem less impressive or valuable.
meanings.sent1: Using poor quality materials bemeans the final product.
meanings.sent2: The outdated design bemeans the overall look of the room.
meanings.sent3: His constant bragging bemeans the achievements of others.
meanings.sent4: A small scratch bemeans the perfection of the painting.
meanings.sent5: A negative attitude bemeans the beauty of life.

meanings.sent2: Spreading rumors bemeans the trust in a friendship.
meanings.sent3: His cruel words bemeans the kindness in the room.
meanings.sent4: Cheating in a game bemeans the spirit of fair play.
meanings.sent5: A lie bemeans the honesty in a relationship.
